Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is truly a testament to excellence and can significantly enhance your experience. Considering its superior features and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is not only functional but also a symbol of quality. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your standards with our top-tier offering. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
